content:
Russian troops hit several drones on the "point of indomitable" in the Kherson region, three people were injured.

About thisreportedKherson Ova.

"It became known about the three victims of two FPV-pins at the point of indomitability in the Novo Alexandrovsky community,"-the message reads.

Thus, a 74-year-old woman with a mine-explosive injury and an injury of the hand were taken to the hospital.

“And also-a 61-year-old local resident. Among the victims is a 54-year-old man. He was diagnosed with mine-breeding injury, head injury and injury. All the victims doctors provide the necessary help, ”Ova said.

As the Armyinform Wrote,The army of the Russian Federation on March 22attacked the village of Zmiivka of Kherson region,The shelling was killed by a local resident.
title: The enemy hit the "point of indomitable" in Kherson region, there are wounded
description: This was reported by the Kherson Ova. “It became known about three victims as a result of the attack ...
author: Army Inform
